system.requirement: After you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.b643d9ea53ff8d98]{Forge a Bond} with a Jaguar Warrior and they agree to train you...

abilities.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} by silently stalking your quarry, blending into shadow and remaining motionless, or swimming, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} by embodying the brutal efficiency of a jaguar (decide before rolling), inflict +1 harm on a hit. Then choose one way to honor the great jaguar spirit.

  • Blood sacrifice: @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.fdb51ee928b4fca2]{Endure Harm} (1).
  • Become the beast: @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.e09e2fc8bb709320]{Endure Stress} (1).

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.aac3783710ad7499]{End the Fight} by attempting to take your foe alive, you may burn momentum to reduce each challenge die by 1 if your momentum is higher than both dice.
